alert.note: Alert for Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 24 at 9:13PM CST until January 24 at 10:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Walthall County in southern Mississippi... Eastern Pike County in southern Mississippi... * Until 1000 PM CST. * At 912 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Tylertown, or 11 miles east of Mccomb, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tylertown and Salem. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm may cause serious injury and significant property damage.
